item.description: This will be the last HOME game for UCONN Football in 2011 vs RUTGERS. Here's our last chance to attract support from nearly 40,000 UCONN fans. Meet up at Wendy's Parking Lot...303 Main St. East Hartford, CT at 8:30 SHARP !!! Those who wish to attend a little later can always park @ Cabellas Parking Lot, and walk over to our "Tailgating HQ" !! We need to recruit more supporters and sign wavers.....If you see a nearby resident with a Ron Paul sign in their yard, don't be shy, stop by, and engage, and promote our Meet Up; group. WE ARE GOING TO TRY A DIFFERENT PARKING LOT THIS WEEK.....MUCH BIGGER LOT, WITH MORE EXPOSURE...I GOT PLENTY OF HOT DOGS, SO BRING SOMETHING DIFFERENT IF YOU WISH TO GRILL....
item.name: UCONN FOOTBALL - SIGN BOMB - SIGN WAVE - Material Hand Outs (3rd edition)
